abstract: Netflix, in a deal announced Friday with AMC, will begin streaming the first season of "The Walking Dead."
snippet: Netflix, in a deal announced Friday with AMC, will begin streaming the first season of "The Walking Dead."
lead_paragraph: Just in time for people to catch up with "The Walking Dead," the AMC series that begins its second season on Oct. 16, the first season is now streaming on Netflix.

headline.main: Netflix to Stream AMC's 'The Walking Dead'
